The current average price for a gallon of gas in Oregon is $5.42. 

This time last year? $3.45.

You do the math. It's time to unleash American energy 𝙣𝙤𝙬 and end this madness.

It appears @POTUS was unaware of the impending baby formula shortage until April of this year, despite the @US_FDA being alerted to inadequate conditions at Abbott Laboratories in October of 𝘭𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘺𝘦𝘢𝘳.
